entity_name = 'HorizonAppealsEvent'
db_name = 'odw_standardised_db'
incremental_key = 'None'
is_horizonbus_schema: bool = True

from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql import DataFrame
import pprint
import json
import requests

type_mapping = {
    'string': StringType(),
    'number': DoubleType(),
    'integer': LongType(),
    'boolean': BooleanType(),
    'null': NullType(),
    'date-time': TimestampType()

if is_horizonbus_schema:
    logInfo("Creating horizon schema")
    standardised_fields = StructType([
        StructField("ingested_datetime", TimestampType(), False),
        StructField("expected_from", TimestampType(), False),
        StructField("expected_to", TimestampType(), False),
        StructField("message_id", StringType(), False),
        StructField("message_type", StringType(), False),
        StructField("message_enqueued_time_utc", StringType(), False),
        StructField("input_file", StringType(), False)
    ])
else:
    logInfo("Creating standard schema")
    standardised_fields = StructType([
        StructField("ingested_datetime", TimestampType(), False),
        StructField("expected_from", TimestampType(), False),
        StructField("expected_to", TimestampType(), False)
    ])


if incremental_key:
    logInfo("Adding incremental key")
    incremental_key_field = StructType([
        StructField(incremental_key, LongType(), False)
    ])
else:
    incremental_key_field = None

harmonised_fields = StructType([
    StructField("migrated", StringType(), False),
    StructField("ODTSourceSystem", StringType(), True),
    StructField("SourceSystemID", StringType(), True),
    StructField("IngestionDate", StringType(), True),
    StructField("ValidTo", StringType(), True),
    StructField("RowID", StringType(), True),
    StructField("IsActive", StringType(), True)
])
if is_horizonbus_schema:
    harmonised_fields = StructType(harmonised_fields.fields + [StructField("message_id", StringType(), True)])

url: str = f"https://github.com/Planning-Inspectorate/odw-config/blob/main/data-lake/standardised_table_definitions/Horizon/{entity_name}.json"
json_schema: dict = get_schema_from_url(url)
print(json_schema)

url: str = f"https://github.com/Planning-Inspectorate/odw-config/blob/main/data-lake/standardised_table_definitions/Horizon/{entity_name}.json"
logInfo(f"Fetching from {url}")
json_schema: dict = get_schema_from_url(url)
if not json_schema:
    logError(f"Invalid schema retrieved from {url}")
    mssparkutils.notebook.exit('')

resolved_schema: dict = resolve_refs(json_schema, json_schema.get('$defs', {}))
spark_schema: StructType = transform_schema(resolved_schema)
final_schema: StructType = add_master_columns_to_schema(db_name)
